message: I'm being generous, but I'm also being realistic.  Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give away the farm!
Let's be fair this time, Bob. I'm willing to split it evenly, but we need to come to an agreement soon.
You're being too greedy, Alice. I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I need to take care of myself too.
This is my final offer, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fair share.  Let's not let this money slip away from both of us.
